response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, it's valued at $12,000 to me. However, considering its worth to you, I am offering it to you for $9,500. This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a discounted rate, tailored specifically to meet your requirements. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 9500}
